title: The Bookstore
subtle: Concept (fiction), 16 words, Level aa (Grade K), Lexile BR20L
description: Visiting a bookstore is an exciting trip, which some students may be familiar with, while others may not. The Bookstore is a simple story that allows students to learn what they can see in a bookstore. Detailed illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support early emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify the setting and to recognize and use nouns.
reviewWords: bookstore, chair, helpers, room, snacks, story
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word the
